name: Escape to Home - GGJ 2019
description: Your malevolent neighbor has stuck a bargain with the god of mischief and you have been dropped into to the labyrinth of an old underground shelter. You must find the generator, restore power to the shelter before the batteries run out. Once the immediate threat is resolved, clues throughout the shelter will lead you through the maze of rooms in hopes that you will be able to escape and return home.
